lines.i: The Medications Administered section defines medications and fluids administered during the procedure, encounter, or other activity excluding anesthetic medications. This guide recommends anesthesia medications be documented as described in the section on Anesthesia.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8152, CONF:10405 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15383)/@code="29549-3" Medications Administered (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15384)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8156)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15383)/@code="29549-3" Medications Administered (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15384)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8156)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
